fr.inrialpes.exmo.align.service

Class AlignmentService

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.inrialpes.exmo.align.cli.CommonCLI
      • fr.inrialpes.exmo.align.service.AlignmentService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    LOVAlignmentService

    public class AlignmentService
extends CommonCLI
    AlignmentService The basic alignment service able to run a store and answer queries... 
        java -jar alignsvc.jar [options]
    where the options are: 
            --load=filename -l filename     Load previous image
        --params=filename -p filename   Read the parameters in file
        --help -h                       Print this message
    
    $Id: AlignmentService.java 2038 2015-03-12 17:13:51Z euzenat $
    Author:
    Jérôme Euzenat
